Notes: Artifacts, genealogy and family histories, histories of cities and towns of St. Clair County from the first settlement to the present.  Hall of Heros section covers from the Civil War to the present time with military artifacts, uniforms, and pictures of veterans of St. Clair County.  The museum also has a special section of fishing memorabilia, lures, rods, reels, motors, etc.
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
